text: haey nowpel delke sautr ayeat robsa yeung da cheak chbasa towleu puokke puok del min sangkhumthanung chuob yeung ban niyeay tha chaur anak( mou ham meat) neamk nouv kompir kuor an phe sa ng pinih ryy phlasa bdaur vea tow . chaur anak tb vinh tha khnhom kmean setthi knong karophlasabdaur vea tam chamnngchetd robsakhnhom noh laey . pitabrakd nasa khnhom khlach tearounakamm nea thngai da thomtheng bae khnhom lmeusa nung batobanhchea nei mcheasa robsakhnhom noh
